item.title: Making of the Dukies
item.description:
The Processs of Knitting & Crocheting my own Duke Sucellus Slippers

I thought Iâ€™d start off easy with my first post, and share a pair of slippers I made based off an item in (old school) runescape. I took a lot of notes since I had to do everything twice to make a pair of slippers, so here is my pattern write-up.

I realize this is a really niche topic, this pattern requires you to:
